Prepare methods

Source: R/prep_for_json.R
prep_methods.Rd

Collection of methods for preparing data conveniently named to make preparing easier

Usage

prep_methods()

Value

list of methods

See also

Other JSON Prep: clean_field_names(), get_entity(), prep_affiliation(), prep_array(), prep_array_objects(), prep_atomic(), prep_creators(), prep_data(), prep_descriptions(), prep_for_json(), prep_from_metadata_template(), prep_fundingReferences(), prep_identifier(), prep_language(), prep_methodology(), prep_nameIdentifiers(), prep_object(), prep_publicationYear(), prep_relatedIdentifiers(), prep_rights(), prep_subjects(), prep_titles()

Examples


prep_methods()
#> $data
#> function (x) 
#> {
#>     prep_object(x)
#> }
#> <bytecode: 0x55c2ee0016b8>
#> <environment: namespace:wddsWizard>
#> 
#> $creators
#> function (x) 
#> {
#>     assertthat::assert_that(is.list(x), msg = "x must be a list")
#>     x_aff <- purrr::map(x, prep_affiliation)
#>     x_nid <- purrr::map(x_aff, prep_nameIdentifiers)
#>     out <- prep_array_objects(x_nid)
#>     return(out)
#> }
#> <bytecode: 0x55c2ef4edfc0>
#> <environment: namespace:wddsWizard>
#> 
#> $descriptions
#> function (x) 
#> {
#>     prep_array_objects(x)
#> }
#> <bytecode: 0x55c2eb722120>
#> <environment: namespace:wddsWizard>
#> 
#> $fundingReferences
#> function (x) 
#> {
#>     prep_array_objects(x)
#> }
#> <bytecode: 0x55c2ee001ed0>
#> <environment: namespace:wddsWizard>
#> 
#> $identifier
#> function (x) 
#> {
#>     prep_array_objects(x)
#> }
#> <bytecode: 0x55c2ee002678>
#> <environment: namespace:wddsWizard>
#> 
#> $relatedIdentifiers
#> function (x) 
#> {
#>     prep_array_objects(x)
#> }
#> <bytecode: 0x55c2edffeff0>
#> <environment: namespace:wddsWizard>
#> 
#> $language
#> function (x) 
#> {
#>     prep_atomic(x)
#> }
#> <bytecode: 0x55c2edfff798>
#> <environment: namespace:wddsWizard>
#> 
#> $methodology
#> function (x) 
#> {
#>     assertthat::assert_that(is.list(x), msg = "x must be a list")
#>     check_for_names <- c("eventBased", "archival") %in% names(x)
#>     assertthat::assert_that(all(check_for_names), msg = "x must have items `eventBased` and `archival`")
#>     x <- dplyr::mutate(x, eventBased = as.logical(.data$eventBased), 
#>         archival = as.logical(.data$archival))
#>     prep_object(x, unbox = TRUE)
#> }
#> <bytecode: 0x55c2edffff40>
#> <environment: namespace:wddsWizard>
#> 
#> $publicationYear
#> function (x) 
#> {
#>     prep_atomic(x)
#> }
#> <bytecode: 0x55c2edffd798>
#> <environment: namespace:wddsWizard>
#> 
#> $rights
#> function (x) 
#> {
#>     prep_array_objects(x)
#> }
#> <bytecode: 0x55c2edffdf40>
#> <environment: namespace:wddsWizard>

#>     prep_array_objects(x)
